attributes.action: guarantee that the maintenance loans and funding will be paid on time and that there are not any raise on the tuition fees for all students in the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For all Students throughout the United Kingdom, we want our funding paid to us on time and for the tuition fees to Stay at the rate £3225.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
